sql.name: GET_LIBRARY_SQL
sql.query: SELECT L.idNUm as idNum ,L.notice as notice ,L.isOpen as isOpen ,U.idNum as uidNum FROM LIBRARY L, USER U WHERE L.user_idNum = U.idNum AND U.user_id = ? AND U.isdelete = 0

sql.name: MODIFY_LIBRARY_SQL
sql.query: UPDATE LIBRARY SET notice = ? ,isOpen = ? WHERE user_IdNum=? AND idNum = ?

sql.name: INSERT_LIBRARY_SQL
sql.query: INSERT INTO LIBRARY(user_idNum, notice, isOpen) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

sql.name: INSERT_LIBRARYBOOK_SQL
sql.query: INSERT INTO LIBRARYBOOK(book_idNum , library_idNum , read_Date , state , ispossess) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
